page.title: 18Recreation
page.content: Listooder pipe band is named after Thomas Alexander Black.It is now called the Alexander Memorial Pipe Band.Originally it was called the Victoria Flute Band until it changed to the Alexander Memorial Pipe Band in 1932.The Victoria flute band had been started at least a century before that.It now consists of pipes and drums.Their uniforms are kilts,white shirts and black jackets.They also have a cap with a badge on the front. They take part in marches and parades,and on the Twelfth of July they lead the Listooder Orange Lodge.
